followUpQuestions.question: What warning lights and indicators are lighted on your dashboard?

noPower.solution: Your car has Loose cable connection, Bad fuse box, or Bad ground wire. Contact our experts to troubleshoot.

engineLight.solution: There may be an issue with the engine or its related systems. Check if your gas cap is securely fastened. If the issue persists, contact our team for a detailed engine diagnostic.

batteryLight.solution: The battery may need replacement or charging. Contact our team for further assistance.

oilLight.solution: The oil level may be low or there could be an issue with the oil pressure system. Check your vehicleâ€™s oil level and contact our team for further assistance.

coolantLight.solution: Your vehicle may be running low on coolant, or there may be a problem with the cooling system. Check your coolant level and contact our team if the problem persists.
